articles.content:
LIV Golf's successful inaugural season had everything to do with the number of elite golfers who defected from the PGA Tour to join the upstart league.
But since the season ended in October, that st… [+2189 chars]

articles.title: Devin Booker channels new final form in Phoenix Suns’ win vs. Clippers - Arizona Sports
articles.description: Phoenix Suns guard Devin Booker continues to take his game to new heights in the playoffs against the Los Angeles Clippers.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES — They all count the same in the win and loss column. It’s true in some ways, especially in the playoffs.
